title: Summoner Icons for Champion Mastery
body: Just a small thought that I had, and I don't know how this will be seen, but I thought it would be nice to have Summoner icons of champions in-game face icons when you hit Mastery level of 5 with them, or some other kind of point of mastery. I just think it would be nice for people to be able to get rewards of champions they are really into, or just something to look forward to once getting mastery level 5, other than a banner on the loading screen / in-game mastery emote. I know it probably seems like a really insignificant thing and perhaps only a few people would feel the same way about it, but I still think it's a nice idea, and so I am giving my idea out here on this post.
